properties.publicRemarks:
4965 Mormon Ave - Private Retreat Residence or Turnkey Short-Term Rental

Welcome to 4965 Mormon Avenue, a tranquil desert retreat nestled on a 2-acre lot in the desirable Mesa neighborhood of Yucca Valley. Whether you're seeking a high-performing investment property or a peaceful getaway near Joshua Tree National Park (or both!), this one-of-a-kind home offers the perfect blend of comfort, nostalgia, and natural beauty.

Recently remodeled, the home features modern updates to the bathrooms, lighting, appliances, and HVAC systems, all while preserving the stunning stonework and wood details that define mid-century desert architecture. Relax and unwind in the hot tub, cowboy pool, or around the fire pit, all thoughtfully added to immerse yourself in the breathtaking desert landscape.

The expansive property includes three separate structures—the main house, casita, and game room—providing excellent privacy and making it ideal for large groups, renters, or visiting family and friends. The 2-bedroom main house boasts a massive stone fireplace, vaulted wood ceilings, and large windows and sliding glass doors that flood the living space with natural light. The spacious primary bedroom features an ensuite bathroom with a double vanity and a luxurious rainhead shower. The casita, just a short walk from the main house along a scenic concrete path, has been recently remodeled and offers a kitchenette, a newly renovated bathroom, and a private outdoor patio.

Step outside any of the buildings to experience the magic of the desert. This property is lush with native juniper, pine, Joshua trees, and agave, providing a truly immersive desert experience. The outdoor amenities—hot tub, cowboy pool, and fire pit—are perfect for stargazing, relaxing, or entertaining guests.

As a short-term rental, this property has a proven track record of success, generating over $75,000 in revenue last year and an impressive average guest rating of 4.91 stars out of 5 on Airbnb.  

This home seamlessly blends nostalgic charm and craftsmanship with modern amenities, set against an awe-inspiring desert backdrop. Whether you're in the market for a second home, a full-time residence, or a high-performing rental property, this exceptional property is ready to welcome you.

Don't miss this incredible opportunity—schedule your showing today!

properties.publicRemarks:
Desert Dreamscape: 9.15 Acres of Untapped Potential in Landers, CA

Discover the allure of the High Desert with this expansive 9.15-acre parcel, identified by APN 0629-373-04-0000. Nestled in the serene landscapes of Landers, this property offers a blank canvas for your vision—be it a tranquil retreat, a custom-built home, or a sustainable desert oasis.

Key Features:

Water Access: A water meter is already installed on the property, streamlining the development process. Please note, the meter is present but not currently connected.

Proximity to Education: Families will appreciate the convenience of Landers Elementary School, located approximately one mile away, ensuring easy access to quality education.

Unparalleled Access: Positioned strategically, this parcel offers incredible access to renowned destinations:

Big Bear: Enjoy year-round recreational activities, from skiing in the winter to hiking and boating in the summer.

Yucca Valley: Experience local shopping, dining, and community events just a short drive away.

Joshua Tree National Park: Immerse yourself in the unique beauty of the desert landscape, world-class rock climbing, and stargazing opportunities.

Natural Beauty: Imagine waking up to breathtaking sunrises over the mountains and winding down with mesmerizing sunsets that paint the desert sky. At night, the clear skies offer a spectacular view of twinkling stars, making this location a haven for astronomy enthusiasts and nature lovers alike.

Development Potential: With ample space, this property provides endless possibilities. Whether you're envisioning a sustainable homestead, an artist's retreat, or a vacation rental, this land is ready to accommodate your dreams.

Important Notice: Buyer's agents are advised to verify lot lines, zoning regulations, and utility connections to ensure the property meets all development requirements.

Seize this rare opportunity to own a substantial piece of the High Desert's charm and create your personalized sanctuary amidst nature's splendor.

properties.publicRemarks:
Looking for the perfect desert escape? Welcome to this beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home for rent, nestled on a spacious 2+ acre lot in the serene desert landscape of Yucca Valley. Whether you're seeking a peaceful full-time residence or a weekend getaway, this home offers the perfect balance of comfort and tranquility.

This home offers 1,026 square feet of well-maintained living space, featuring a modern, upgraded kitchen with a functional island, ideal for cooking and entertaining. The open, airy living spaces are filled with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Step outside to your private, expansive backyard and enjoy the stunning desert views. The large lot gives you plenty of room to roam and embrace the quiet, peaceful surroundings.

Built in 2021, this home comes with all the modern amenities you need. It's located in a quiet area with easy access to local amenities, parks, and hiking trails, making it the ideal spot for those who enjoy the outdoors.

Don't miss your chance to experience the charm of desert living in this stunning home. Schedule your tour today!

properties.publicRemarks:
Embrace the allure of the desert with this unique 63-acre property nestled in the heart of Pioneertown, one of the most sought-after locations in the Morongo Basin. This is a rare chance to own a piece of history and natural beauty, with breathtaking mountain views, vibrant sunsets, seasonal desert wildflowers, and unparalleled tranquility.

Surrounded by stunning desert landscapes, this property offers limitless potential for development, whether you're looking to build a private family home, a captivating campsite, or invest in multiple homes. The land is perfect for hiking, horseback riding, stargazing, or just sitting by the bonfire with family. 
This exceptional property has a rich history — originally occupied by gold miners in the early 1900s, who established a camp and discovered a natural spring on-site. The beautiful creek still flows through the property, adding to its charm. Survey studies on potential uses and buildability have been completed and can be reviewed upon request.

With power access already available via a transformer across the entire property, this land is primed for development. Two existing wells are on-site, although they do need a little rehabilitation. Buyers are encouraged to verify all utilities and infrastructure details with the utility company.

Pioneertown is an iconic desert community, home to musicians, artists, and celebrities, making it a prime location for investment. The area is known for its vibrant music scene, with legendary spots like Pappy & Harriet's and Red Dog Saloon offering entertainment and a true taste of the desert lifestyle. The property is also  in close proximity to The King of the hammers, Palm Springs, back roads to Big Bear, and the world-renowned Joshua Tree National Park.

Whether you are seeking a peaceful retreat, a development project, or a unique investment in a growing area, this property is a must-see with endless possibilities that make for an amazing investment opportunity.

Don't miss out on your chance to own this one of a kind gem in one of the hottest vacation and tourist destinations in Southern California. 

All buyers are responsible for doing their own due diligence regarding utilities, zoning,  and all other property conditions. The accuracy of all information provided, including square footage, is not guaranteed by the agent or broker.

properties.publicRemarks:
Charming Custom Home on 5-Acre Horse Property with Mountain Views & PAID Solar

Welcome to this beautifully maintained 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom custom home, built in 2006 by Stuart Kirk. Nestled on a spacious 5-acre corner lot, this property offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains and is perfectly suited for equestrian living. This property is flat and usable and offers ample space for adding equestrian amenities, including a barn, arena, paddocks, and more—making it an ideal setting for horse enthusiasts.

The home features a bright, open floor plan with abundant natural light throughout. The primary suite includes a large walk-in closet with built-in shelving and an En-suite bathroom with dual vanity sinks and a step-in shower. The additional bedrooms are generously sized, highlighted by charming box windows and plenty of natural light. The backyard has a fire pit, cowboy pool, hammocks and a hot tub, perfect for enjoying those beautiful evenings under the stars. 

Enjoy the convenience of a finished, insulated, and drywalled 2-car garage, along with a welcoming circular driveway in front. The fenced backyard provides a safe and private space for outdoor enjoyment.

Located in a peaceful and quiet neighborhood, this turnkey furnished home is move-in ready and waiting for you to make it your own. Pride of ownership is evident throughout—don't miss this exceptional opportunity!

properties.publicRemarks: New construction! Designer modern home on 2+ acres in an inspiring setting. This neighborhood is known for its abundance of mature Joshua Trees, uplifting vistas of snow caps on Mt San Jacinto & Mt San Gorgonio, upscale neighbors and private settings. Many large windows that bring the surrounding natural beauty inside your home. High ceilings, polished concrete floors, recessed lighting, and gallery walls. Spacious living room. Kitchen island plus ample cabinetry. Exterior oversize roof patio spaces complement the usable space. Horse property. Starry nights. Not far from organic restaurants, cafes, and all amenities in Yucca Valley. Nearby Pioneertown offers the world famous live music venue and bar Pappy and Harriet's. Short drive to the Joshua Tree strip with its farmers market, boutiques and art galleries. 16 miles to the Joshua Tree National Monument where about 3 million tourists visit annually. 38 miles to Palm Springs and 59 miles to Big Bear Lake. About 2 hours and 15 minutes to Los Angeles. Home is in the final stages of construction and will be available soon. Don't wait on this one call now!

properties.publicRemarks: Exceptional 10.81-Acre Corner Parcel with Approved Plans to build a Modern Desert Retreat! This expansive 10.81-acre parcel offers not only prime real estate but come with the plans to build a 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home. The thoughtfully designed 938 sq. ft. residence includes a 398 sq. ft. covered carport that doubles as an outdoor patio. Much of the groundwork has already been completed, saving you tens of thousands of dollars, while also accelerating your timeline to build. Utility-ready (buyer to verify) featuring an installed water meter, electrical poles along the South side of Boo Lane, and underground electrical infrastructure on the West and North side, thanks to neighboring modern homes. The planned home showcases a minimalistic modern aesthetic, blending architectural brilliance with functionality. Highlights include a reflective corrugated exterior facade for a striking, contemporary look, and Maple plywood ceilings with Venetian plaster interior walls, offering an elegant finish. With over 10 acres, you'll have endless possibilities to create the ultimate desert oasis and tranquil spaces for relaxation. Nestled in a peaceful, rural setting, this parcel provides an ideal escape while being close to all the amenities and attractions. Opportunities like this are incredibly rare. Here's the chance to make this dream property your reality! Note: For any questions on zoning, usage, permits, etc. Please contact the San Bernardino County Planning Dept and provide APN: 0631-061-42-0000. Photos shown are renderings based on the home's architectural plans. Lot boundaries are approximate.
